name: Marked Up RPG DEMO
description:
Welcome to the early stages of Marked Up RPG. All images were drawn on white paper, with a permanent marker, specifically a Sharpie.

In this very short demo, you will be playing as Warr, a local favorite. Direct him through a short path, look at the outstanding scenery, and even battle a couple enemies.

Planned Modifications:

1. Create new cover image.

2. Put in plugin to make enemy battler move when attacking.

3.  Add more enemy battlers and characters.

If you want to see more, please leave a comment.
